originalText.text: Amazing. Crazy views. So relaxing to walk around and nobody stress you to go around and leave. Highly recommended to have a drink or food at the restaurant.

text.text: Amazing. Crazy views. So relaxing to walk around and nobody stress you to go around and leave. Highly recommended to have a drink or food at the restaurant.

originalText.text:
Having seen the original site in 2007 of The World Trade Center, One World Trade Center was just starting to be made, I believe.

Seeing what they have done with the area,

9/11 Memorial
One World Trade Center

Serves as a very emotional tribute. My visit in 2007. Left me very emotional as an American citizen now. That connection has grown.

I take so much from both visits and still in disbelief as to what occurred that day. Something you just can’t believe could have occurred.

As I walked around the 9/11 Memorial. I saw some aspects from my original tour in 2007 and showing my Son how as Americans especially New Yorkers, pulled together.

I get a great sense from people I talk too and the lasting effect too this day it holds on us all.

I get so emotional on my right wrist/arm I have 3 rubber bands all for 9/11. WTC tour from 2007 and two from my visit this time in 2023.

New York has done well in gaining so much back from that day, but know it was felt the world over.

If you visit New York City, you’ll not be disappointed in your visit to the area.

Thank You for having us and for the insight and allowing us to see and re live in a way.

Added pictures

Eleven Tears Memorial
Eleven Tears
200 Vesey Street
American Express Tower, Three World Financial Center
(at West Street)
New York, N.Y. 10004

American Express tribute to the 11 American Express employees who lost their lives to the attack.

I saw this in 2007 and forgot the name and certain details. So glad I found it and thank you to Phillip for letting me see the memorial again.

originalText.text: Nice tourist attraction mall near by ground zero. The mall has many stores inside and still has empty space. Very convenient with subway under the building.

text.text: Nice tourist attraction mall near by ground zero. The mall has many stores inside and still has empty space. Very convenient with subway under the building.

originalText.text:
Lower Manhattan lives again. The Occulus is an amazing sight.
Something out of the future. Hard to miss if you're looking for the subway.

text.text:
Lower Manhattan lives again. The Occulus is an amazing sight.
Something out of the future. Hard to miss if you're looking for the subway.

originalText.text: Born in Valencia Spain, Zurich-based architect Santiago Calatrava is world-renowned for his progressive designs, marrying elegance and simplicity, with precision and progress. If the pretext to the location is transportation and a great place to shop, by default, what you will find are tourists from all over the world snapping pictures of this colossal place. It is both a cathedral and a palace for transportation. Soaring ceilings and countless windows make this a “box of light” which heralds a spirit of celebration for something as simple as a train ride. Pay a visit -  but don’t miss out at looking at this architectural wonder as much from the outside, with a 360 degree tour around it  as from the inside. You will be marveled as much as amazed!!!

If the pretext to the location is transportation and a great place to shop, by default, what you will find are tourists from all over the world snapping pictures of this colossal place. It is both a cathedral and a palace for transportation. Soaring ceilings and countless windows make this a “box of light” which heralds a spirit of celebration for something as simple as a train ride. Pay a visit -  but don’t miss out at looking at this architectural wonder as much from the outside, with a 360 degree tour around it  as from the inside. You will be marveled as much as amazed!!!
